name: Get the API
description: How to get the API of this project ?
text:
You can access to the JSON database at this address : https://rws-studio.github.io/open-src-library/api/db/db.json.

You can also get the docs database at this address : /open-src-library/api/db/docs.json.

Did you know?

A SQLite database will coming soon on GitHub !

name: open-source declaration
description: List of all other open-source projects this project is using.
text:
HTML - CSS - JavaScript

JSON
